thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Qtrly EPS $2.50‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Qtrly EPS $2.50‍​
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc :
* . ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER 2017 * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.50‍​ * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $1.36 BILLION VERSUS $289.1 MILLION * QTRLY NON-GAAP: ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE‍​ $0.52
* KNIGHT-SWIFT TRANSPORTATION - Q4 RESULTS INCLUDE $364.2 MILLION INCOME TAX BENEFIT REPRESENTING MANAGEMENT‘S ESTIMATE OF NET IMPACT OF TAX LAW
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.41, REVENUE VIEW $1.37 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* EXPECT NET CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE IN RANGE OF $525 MILLION - $575 MILLION IN 2018‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
